## Balabolka - Text-To-Speech (TTS) Software

Balabolka is a free text-to-speech (TTS) software that can read texts aloud in a computer-generated voice. It was developed by Ilya Morozov and is available in multiple languages, including English, French, German, and Russian. Balabolka can be useful for individuals with different needs, such as those with visual impairments, dyslexia, or reading/writing difficulties. In this article, we will explore its features and how it can be used.

### Features of Balabolka

Balabolka supports various text formats, including Microsoft Word documents, PDF files, HTML pages, and plain texts. You can copy and paste text into the program or load entire documents for it to read. The software can also extract text from images using optical character recognition (OCR) technology.

One of the unique features of Balabolka is its ability to save spoken texts as audio files in different formats, such as WAV, MP3, OGG, and WMA. This feature can be handy for individuals who prefer to listen to texts on-the-go using mobile devices or audio players.

Balabolka also allows users to customize the speech by adjusting settings for pitch, speed, volume, and pronunciation. The software comes with different voices and languages, and users can download additional ones from the internet.

### How Balabolka Can Be Useful

Balabolka can be a helpful tool for individuals with visual impairments, dyslexia, or reading/writing difficulties. By converting texts into speech, Balabolka can provide an alternative way to access written information or to proofread written work.

For example, a student with dyslexia can use Balabolka to read assigned texts aloud to help them better understand and remember the material. Similarly, a person with a visual impairment can use Balabolka to listen to emails, news articles, or other written information that would otherwise be challenging to access.

Balabolka can also be useful for language learners who want to improve their pronunciation or understand spoken texts better. By listening to spoken texts, they can practice speaking and develop their listening skills.

### Conclusion

Balabolka is a versatile and user-friendly TTS software that can be helpful for individuals with different needs. Its features and capabilities make it a valuable tool for improving access to written information and facilitating communication. And best of all, it's free!
